alert.note: Alert for North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, northwestern Henry, Coffee, western Geneva and northwestern Walton Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Abbeville to near Ozark to 6 miles southwest of Enterprise to 11 miles northwest of De Funiak Springs. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Level Plains, Samson, Newton, New Brockton, Ariton, Lee, Liberty, Paxton, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Newville, Coffee Springs, Carl Folsom A/p, Hooper Stage Field and Gerald. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
